committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment

official_title: To amend the Endangered Species Act to provide for public participation before a species is proposed for listing as threatened or endangered, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Endangered Species Act to require the Secretary of the Interior, if a petition to list a species as endangered or threatened is warranted, to accept written scientific biological data from the public on the status of the species. Requires the Secretary to designate an administrative law judge to conduct an evidentiary hearing to review such data.

titles.title: To amend the Endangered Species Act to provide for public participation before a species is proposed for listing as threatened or endangered, and for other purposes.
